column1: How often do you purchase Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) such as food, beverages, household items, or personal care products?
column2: How much does the presence of environmental claims on FMCG products influence your purchasing decisions?
column3: If an FMCG product contains misleading environmental claims but is priced significantly lower than a truly eco-friendly product, which would you choose?
column4: To what extent does price influence your decision to purchase an FMCG product that makes environmental claims?
